meta.job_title: Senior Director of Campaigns, Research & Learning

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote Wiley's products and solutions.
Lead a team of marketing specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing digital channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, to showcase offerings and network with potential clients.
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
